official_title: A bill to make certain provisions of the Lacey Act Amendments of 1981 inapplicable to the harvesting of, and other actions taken with respect to, foreign shrimp.

summary.text: Amends the Lacey Act Amendments of 1981 to exempt the import, export, sale, or purchase of foreign shrimp from provisions of such law prohibiting the illegal taking of any fish or wildlife.

titles.title: A bill to make certain provisions of the Lacey Act Amendments of 1981 inapplicable to the harvesting of, and other actions taken with respect to, foreign shrimp.
